Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Action
    This annotation marks method as action method.
    ActionClass
    Classes marked with this annotation are considered as Bristleback Action Classes.
    Authenticator
    Actions marked with this annotation are considered as the authenticators, which means they are intercepted with AuthenticationInterceptor.
    Authorized
    Prototype of simple Bristleback built in authorization.
    ClientAction
    This annotation marks method as client action method.
    ClientActionClass
    Classes marked with this annotation are considered as Bristleback Client Action Classes.
    Ignore
    This annotation should be placed before client action parameters that are not meant to be serialized.
    Intercept
    Marks single action or whole action class as intercepted by the interceptors listed in annotation values.
    Interceptor
    Beans marked with this annotation must implement ActionInterceptor interface.
    ObjectSender
    All ConditionObjectSender fields must be marked with this annotation to be properly initialized by Bristleback Server.
